text: Okusinziira ku ekyo twassa etteeka ku baana ba Israil nti mazima oyo atta omuntu atatemudde muntu, oba atakoze bwonoonefu mu nsi, mazima ddala aba nga asse abantu bonna., ate ataasa obulamu bw'omuntu omu aba nga ataasizza obulamu bwa bantu bonna, (ebyo abayudaaya baalibadde babitegeera) anti mazima ababaka baffe babaleetera amateeka amannyonnyofu, naye ate oluvanyuma lwekyo mazima bangi ku bo baasigala beeyisa bubi mu nsi
